subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Dayron Robles of Cuba set a world record of 12.87 seconds in the 110-meter hurdles, eclipsing the mark previously held by Liu Xiang, China’s most celebrated Olympic star.
snippet: Dayron Robles of Cuba set a world record of 12.87 seconds in the 110-meter hurdles, eclipsing the mark previously held by Liu Xiang, China’s most celebrated Olympic star.
